title: Minion / Tiempos lookalike
content:
Hi guys,

I'm thinking this is similar to Minion or Tiempos…any ideas?

Cheers!

Paul W.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111235im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-11%20at%2016_5905.53.41.png)

Font: 

 Tiempos Bold 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111235/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-09-11 at 16.53.41.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111235/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-09-11%20at%2016.53.41.png) | 9.9 KB |
author: paul_w

comments.content:
Plantin was my first guess, but some of the details are off.

Tabac Medium Bold is also close, but not quite right:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/tabac/g3-medium-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111235/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/tabac/g3-medium-bold/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/tabac/g3-medium-bold/")

Also close, but still not quite right, is Arbesco Extra Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/arbesco-dt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111235/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/arbesco-dt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/arbesco-dt/")

Very close to Plantin indeed, but I think **[Tiempos Text (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111235/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=KlimType&ffam=Tiempos%20Text%20-%20Bold&fid=d36f5cc51a51cfc7c61a929a5e0b9ade&fsize=60&text=Move%20Loot&fit=1)** by KlimType [2010] is an exact match.

Ah, it's by Klim Type Foundry--Tiempos Text Bold:  
 [https://klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/tiempos-text/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317111235/https:/klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/tiempos-text/ "https://klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/tiempos-text/")

EDIT: Fivos for the win....
Haha! I maybe should have tested it out…thanks guys :)
